title: Crypto
content: we seek to take a long position in underprice crypto while selling short overpriced tokens.

title: Forex
content: We apply arbitrage strategy to take advantage of price differences in different markets for the same asset.

title: OTC
content: We fund ICO projects by buying tokens to access their network or service.
